Class Brand {
  description: "Here is some description about something really awesome";
  subClassOf: some_other_label;
  properties:
    a_property required="false",
    b_property minItems=2 maxItems=3,
    u/some_one/from/1.0.0/property/c_property;
}

Property a_property {
  description: "some_description";
  range: Text;
}

Property b_property {
  description: "some_description that is reall y olong";
  range: Enum values=["1", "hello", 2,3,]
}

Property a_property {
  description: "some_description";
  range: Text regex=/some_regec/g;
}

Property b_property {
  description: "some_description";
  range NestedObject;
  properties: a_property required;
}
